turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking for some help placing a pickup pizza order from Bella Luna Pizzeria. Can you assist?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pick up pizza order from bella luna sure i can assist you with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small got it, what are your toppings of choice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Onion, tomato and broccoli, so one onion, one tomato, one broccoli.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with onion, 1 with tomato and 1 with broccoli is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok lets review your order, one moment please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 small pizzas, 1 with onion, 1 with tomato and 1 with broccoli all with extra cheese is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got that correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 36 dollars, shall we go ahead and order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, how long till I can go pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be 30 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
